attributes.action: Stop OFCOM forcing Sky to play with Virgin
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
OFCOM, the regulator of media, is currently forcing BSkyB to provide its premium channels (movies and sports) to competitor(s), Virgin Media, at "fair market prices".

I believe this is an abuse of government power and a total disdain for free market principals, we should not punish companies for being successful an creating popular channels.

Virgin should pay any rates Sky set, they do not have an instant right to take somebody elses services or channels and make a profit from them.

I don't walk into Skys headquaters and demand their stations for a "fair price", I pay the price Sky and I believe their services are worth.

The government should not step in to aid an inferior and less popular service - people have to work to be successful, the government shouldn't do it for them ...
